div.p: Why an entry is in the result set - whether it's included as a match or because of an _include requirement.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/search-entry-mode defines the following codes:

tr.td: This resource matched the search specification.
This resource is returned because it is referred to from another resource in the search set.
An OperationOutcome that provides additional information about the processing of a search.

description.value: Why an entry is in the result set - whether it's included as a match or because of an _include requirement.

definition.value: This resource matched the search specification.
This resource is returned because it is referred to from another resource in the search set.
An OperationOutcome that provides additional information about the processing of a search.
